pullRequest.title: Issue 19006 sequential stateful-job
pullRequest.bodyText:
This basically comes to correct firing several instances of a stateful job
We're changing the behavior so there can only be one instance running at a time. Triggers are queued up. and even though their fire date is left behind in the past (because of other job taking so long to complete) They will still fire up.
#19006
